full_text: We decline further comment. Office of Public Affairs Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division Federal Bureau of Prisons (202) 514-6551 - phone (202) 514-6620 - fax (b)(6) @cbsnews.com> 8/11/2019 5:14 AM >>> Hi there - I understand officials may have given a statement yesterday on whether or not Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch. Are you able to confirm whether or not he was or might you have a statement regarding the issue that you sent to others? I appreciate it, on behalf of CBS News. Description: untitled Radio Anchor/Correspondent New York, NY Newsroom: 212-975-3615 (b)(6) @cbsnews.com Page 955 DOJ-OGR-00023579

(b)(6) @cbsnews.com> 8/11/2019 5:14 AM >>> Hi there - I understand officials may have given a statement yesterday on whether or not Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch. Are you able to confirm whether or not he was or might you have a statement regarding the issue that you sent to others? I appreciate it, on behalf of CBS News.
Description: untitled Radio Anchor/Correspondent New York, NY Newsroom: 212-975-3615 (b)(6) @cbsnews.com

additional_notes: The document appears to be a redacted email exchange between CBS News and the Federal Bureau of Prisons regarding Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch status. The redactions are indicated by (b)(6).
